CONFIRMATION:
Are you sure you want to restore the server invites? All members will recover the invites they had before the last time the command `{{prefix}}remove-invites` was executed.

:information_source: **Invites overview**:
This operation will restore, in total: **{{regular}}** regulars, **{{bonus}}** bonus, **{{leaves}}** leaves, **{{fake}}** fake.

{{success}} Send `-confirm` to confirm.
{{error}} Send `cancel` to cancel.
